misc: Doubles as a professional model as his side hustle
Few players dare to give him lip due to his intimidating presence and wrestling skills
biography: Olli, a formidable presence on the golf course, hails from Helsingin Golfklubi. Beyond the greens, Olli is known to dabble in the world of professional modeling, showcasing a different facet of his multifaceted persona.

With seven past appearances at the Hector Trophée, Olli is a familiar face at the event. While the Hector Trophée and Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, his competitive spirit remains undeterred as he continues to actively participate in Hector events. He is anticipated to make his eighth appearance in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025.

Olli's imposing demeanor, complemented by his wrestling skills, ensures that few dare to challenge him directly. This psychological edge, combined with his golfing prowess, makes him a player to watch at any tournament.
